name: Total Health Survival
description:
Entry for Mini Game Jam 128 - Health.

If your health aspects get below 0%, your health suffers. If your health reaches 0%, you lose! Play minigames to keep up your aspects, but don't get upset when you lose, because aging is inevitable and we haven't cured it yet. 

Better post what age you could reach before kicking the bucket  in the comments section and discuss with your fellow players how poorly balanced Insult Retort is or how there are way too few minigames!
